thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Marisa

author: Marisa
title: Marisa
text: I've ordered multiple times now from them and haven't had one issue. The processing/shipping is fast (only about 1 week total from order to your door) and tracking is easy to follow. They have many many titles to choose from and pricings are around $3-10 for almost any book you choose. Shipping is always free if you order over $10. Overall a great company that I will be ordering from for many more times to come.
